eq: D-Glyceraldehyde + H2O + Oxidized ferredoxin <=> D-Glycerate + H+ + Reduced ferredoxin

eq: D-Glyceraldehyde + NADP+ + H2O <=> D-Glycerate + NADPH + H+

eq: D-Gluconic acid + NADP+ <=> 2-Keto-D-gluconic acid + NADPH + H+
